title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same capabilities as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (React/TypeScript) for Ollama servers; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around ollama with persistent context, syntax highlighting and prompt history.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and Unity.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models onto Kubernetes clusters with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization, Q&A and brainstorming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping Ollama’s REST API; tokio/hyper based with serde models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query self-hosted Ollama models using slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot server (Go) forwarding messages to Ollama with per-user model selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template combining Ollama LLM, HuggingFace embeddings and Weaviate vector store.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate local Ollama models into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated repository of Modelfiles for fine-tuned and niche models ready to import into Ollama.
